sqlMap.sql: AND CONECT_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#FR_CONECT_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#TO_CONECT_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999
sqlMap.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CONECT_SN DESC) AS ROWSEQ , CONECT_SN , CONECT_ID , (SELECT X.USER_NM FROM TB_USER X WHERE X.ESNTL_ID = A.CONECT_ID) USER_NM , CONECT_IP , TO_CHAR(CONECT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CONECT_DT FROM TB_CONECT_HIST A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT TO_CHAR(CONECT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CONECT_DT , COUNT(CONECT_SN) CONECT_CNT , SUM(DECODE(CONECT_ID, NULL, 0, '', 0, 1)) CONECT_MBER_CNT , SUM(DECODE(CONECT_ID, NULL, 1, '', 1, 0)) CONECT_NOT_MBER_CNT FROM TB_CONECT_HIST WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CONECT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY CONECT_DT

SELECT TO_CHAR(CONECT_DT, 'YYYY-MM') CONECT_DT , COUNT(CONECT_SN) CONECT_CNT , SUM(DECODE(CONECT_ID, NULL, 0, '', 0, 1)) CONECT_MBER_CNT , SUM(DECODE(CONECT_ID, NULL, 1, '', 1, 0)) CONECT_NOT_MBER_CNT FROM TB_CONECT_HIST WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CONECT_DT, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY CONECT_DT
